segment.name: address
segment.desc: To specify an address.

segment.name: agreementIdentification
segment.desc: To specify the agreement details.

segment.name: adjustmentDetails
segment.desc: To identify the reason for an adjustment.

segment.name: allowanceOrCharge
segment.desc: To identify allowance or charge details.

segment.name: additionalInformation
segment.desc: To indicate that special conditions due to the origin, customs preference, fiscal or commercial factors are applicable.

segment.name: additionalPriceInformation
segment.desc: To provide information concerning pricing related to class of trade, price multiplier, and reason for change.

segment.name: amountsRelationshipDetails
segment.desc: To provide details of the function of a monetary amount.

segment.name: arrayInformation
segment.desc: To contain the data in a array. Note: The composite C770 - array cell details - occurs 100 times in the segment. The component 9424 - array cell information - occurs 100 times in the composite C770.

segment.name: arrayStructureIdentification
segment.desc: To identify the structure of an array.

segment.name: attribute
segment.desc: To identify a specific attribute.

segment.name: authenticationResult
segment.desc: To specify results of the application of an authentification procedure.

segment.name: beginningOfMessage
segment.desc: To indicate the type and function of a message and to transmit the identifying number.

segment.name: structureIdentification
segment.desc: A segment used to convey an indexing structure mechanism which identifies the positioning of a group or item.

segment.name: businessFunction
segment.desc: To provide information related to the processing and purpose of a financial message.

segment.name: characteristicValue
segment.desc: To provide the value of a characteristic.

segment.name: creditCoverDetails
segment.desc: To request a credit cover, reply to that request and disclose the reason for the reply.

segment.name: characteristicclassId
segment.desc: To identify the relevance of a characteristic information for subsequent business processes.

segment.name: physicalOrLogicalState
segment.desc: To describe a physical or logical state.

segment.name: codeSetIdentification
segment.desc: To identify a code set and to give its class and maintenance operation.

segment.name: codeValueDefinition
segment.desc: To provide information related to a code value.

segment.name: computerEnvironmentDetails
segment.desc: To give a precise definition of all necessary elements belonging to the configuration of a computer system like hardware, firmware, operating system, communication (VANS, network type, protocol, format) and application software.

segment.name: clinicalInformation
segment.desc: To describe an item of clinical information.

segment.name: clinicalIntervention
segment.desc: To specify a clinical intervention such as treatments and investigations.

segment.name: compositeDataElementIdentification
segment.desc: To identify a composite data element and to give its class and maintenance operation.

segment.name: consignmentInformation
segment.desc: To identify one consignment.

segment.name: controlTotal
segment.desc: To provide control total.

segment.name: componentDetails
segment.desc: To provide component details of an object (e.g. product, container) such as its type and the material of which it is composed.

segment.name: communicationContact
segment.desc: To identify a communication number of a department or a person to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: contributionDetails
segment.desc: To specify details about membership contributions.

segment.name: chargePaymentInstructions
segment.desc: To identify a charge.

segment.name: consignmentPackingSequence
segment.desc: To identify the sequence in which physical packing is presented in the consignment, and optionally to identify the hierarchical relationship between packing layers.

segment.name: customsStatusOfGoods
segment.desc: To specify goods in terms of customs identities, status and intended use.

segment.name: contactInformation
segment.desc: To identify a person or a department to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: currencies
segment.desc: To specify currencies used in the transaction and relevant details for the rate of exchange.

segment.name: damage
segment.desc: To specify damage including action taken.

segment.name: dangerousGoods
segment.desc: To identify dangerous goods.

segment.name: directoryIdentification
segment.desc: To identify a directory and to give its release, status, controlling agency, language and maintenance operation.

segment.name: dimensions
segment.desc: To specify dimensions.

segment.name: documentLineIdentification
segment.desc: To specify the processing mode of a specific line within a referenced document.

segment.name: deliveryLimitations
segment.desc: To specify limitations on deliveries.

segment.name: documentmessageSummary
segment.desc: To specify summary information relating to the document/message.

segment.name: documentmessageDetails
segment.desc: To identify documents, either printed, electronically transferred, or referenced as specified in message description, including, where relevant, the identification of the type of transaction that will result from this message.

segment.name: dosageAdministration
segment.desc: To communicate how dose(s) are administered.

segment.name: dataSetIdentification
segment.desc: To identify a data set.

segment.name: datetimeperiod
segment.desc: To specify date, and/or time, or period.

segment.name: externalFileLinkIdentification
segment.desc: To specify the link of one non-EDIFACT external file to an EDIFACT message.

segment.name: simpleDataElementDetails
segment.desc: To identify a simple data element and give related details.

segment.name: dataElementUsageDetails
segment.desc: To specify the usage of a data element.

segment.name: employmentDetails
segment.desc: To specify employment details.

segment.name: attachedEquipment
segment.desc: To specify attached or related equipment.

segment.name: equipmentDetails
segment.desc: To identify a unit of equipment.

segment.name: numberOfUnits
segment.desc: To specify the number of units.

segment.name: applicationErrorInformation
segment.desc: To identify the type of application error within a message.

segment.name: errorPointDetails
segment.desc: A segment to identify the location of an application error within a message.

segment.name: financialChargesAllocation
segment.desc: Description of allocation of charges.

segment.name: financialInstitutionInformation
segment.desc: To identify an account and a related financial institution.

segment.name: footnoteSet
segment.desc: To identify a set of footnotes.

segment.name: footnote
segment.desc: To identify a footnote.

segment.name: freeText
segment.desc: To provide free form or coded text information.

segment.name: natureOfCargo
segment.desc: To indicate the type of cargo as a general classification.

segment.name: goodsItemDetails
segment.desc: To indicate totals of a goods item.

segment.name: goodsIdentityNumber
segment.desc: To give specific identification numbers, either as single numbers or ranges.

segment.name: relatedIdentificationNumbers
segment.desc: To specify a related set of identification numbers.

segment.name: generalIndicator
segment.desc: To transmit a processing indicator.

segment.name: governmentalRequirements
segment.desc: To indicate the requirement for a specific govermental action and/or procedure or which specific procedure is valid for a specific part of the transport.

segment.name: segmentGroupUsageDetails
segment.desc: To specify the usage of a segment group within a message type structure and its maintenance operation.

segment.name: handlingInstructions
segment.desc: To specify handling and where necessary, notify hazards.

segment.name: hierarchyInformation
segment.desc: A segment to identify hierarchical connections from a given item to higher or lower levelled item.

segment.name: insuranceCoverDescription
segment.desc: To describe the insurance cover.

segment.name: identity
segment.desc: To identify an object.

segment.name: personCharacteristic
segment.desc: To specify characteristics of a person such as ethnic origin.

segment.name: itemDescription
segment.desc: To describe an item in either an industry or free format.

segment.name: indexDetails
segment.desc: To specify an index.

segment.name: partiesToInstruction
segment.desc: To specify parties to an instruction and where relevant, the instruction.

segment.name: inventoryManagementRelatedDetails
segment.desc: To provide the different information related to the inventory management functions and needed to process properly the inventory movements and the inventory balances.

segment.name: informationRequired
segment.desc: To indicate which information is requested in a responding message.

segment.name: language
segment.desc: To specify a language.

segment.name: lineItem
segment.desc: To identify a line item and configuration.

segment.name: placelocationIdentification
segment.desc: To identify a country/place/location/related location one/related location two.

segment.name: measurements
segment.desc: To specify physical measurements, including dimension tolerances, weights and counts.

segment.name: membershipDetails
segment.desc: To specify details about membership.

segment.name: marketsalesChannelInformation
segment.desc: To specify to which market and/or through which sales distribution channel and/or for which end-use the sales of product/service have been made or are given as forecast.

segment.name: monetaryAmount
segment.desc: To specify a monetary amount.

segment.name: messageTypeIdentification
segment.desc: To identify a message type and to give its class and maintenance operation.

segment.name: nameAndAddress
segment.desc: To specify the name/address and their related function, either by CO82 only and/or unstructured by CO58 or structured by CO80 thru 3207.

segment.name: nationality
segment.desc: To specify a nationality.

segment.name: package
segment.desc: To describe the number and type of packages/physical units.

segment.name: paymentInstructions
segment.desc: To specify the instructions for payment.

segment.name: attendance
segment.desc: To specify attendance information relating to an individual.

segment.name: paymentTermsBasis
segment.desc: To specify the payment terms basis.

segment.name: percentageDetails
segment.desc: To specify percentage information.

segment.name: packageIdentification
segment.desc: To specify markings and labels on individual packages or physical units.

segment.name: personDemographicInformation
segment.desc: To specify items of person demographic information.

segment.name: productGroupInformation
segment.desc: To indicate the group in which a product belongs.

segment.name: additionalProductId
segment.desc: To specify additional or substitutional item identification codes.

segment.name: priceItemLine
segment.desc: To specify details relating to pricing of a product. Note: Segment marked for deletion in D.98A directory. Segment no longer used by any message in the current draft directory.

segment.name: partyName
segment.desc: To specify information necessary to establish the identity of a party.

segment.name: processIdentification
segment.desc: To identify a process.

segment.name: priceDetails
segment.desc: To specify price information.

segment.name: physicalSampleDescription
segment.desc: To define the physical sample parameters associated with a test, resulting in discrete measurements.

segment.name: priority
segment.desc: The segment is used to communicate priority information.

segment.name: quantity
segment.desc: To specify a pertinent quantity.

segment.name: qualification
segment.desc: To specify the qualification of a person.

segment.name: quantityVariances
segment.desc: To specify item details relating to quantity variances. Note: This segment replaces segment QVA (which has been deleted in this directory).

segment.name: requirementsAndConditions
segment.desc: To specify sector/subject requirements and conditions.

segment.name: relationship
segment.desc: To identify the direct relationship between the data/information contained in one segment and the data/information contained in one or more other segments.

segment.name: reference
segment.desc: To specify a reference.

segment.name: rangeDetails
segment.desc: To identify a range.

segment.name: result
segment.desc: To specify a discrete or non-discrete result as a value or value range.

segment.name: rateDetails
segment.desc: To specify rate information.

segment.name: remunerationTypeIdentification
segment.desc: Identification of a remuneration type.

segment.name: schedulingConditions
segment.desc: To specify scheduling conditions.

segment.name: structureComponentDefinition
segment.desc: To specify a component of a data structure (e.g. an array or table).

segment.name: segmentIdentification
segment.desc: To identify a segment and give its class and maintenance operation.

segment.name: sealNumber
segment.desc: To specify a seal number related to equipment.

segment.name: sequenceDetails
segment.desc: To provide specific details related to the delivery sequence.

segment.name: safetyInformation
segment.desc: To identify regulatory safety information.

segment.name: splitGoodsPlacement
segment.desc: To specify the placement of goods in relation to equipment.

segment.name: segmentUsageDetails
segment.desc: To specify the details of the usage of a segment within a message type structure.

segment.name: organisationClassificationDetails
segment.desc: To provide classification details relating to the activities of an organisation.

segment.name: samplingParametersForSummaryStatistics
segment.desc: To define the sampling parameters associated with summary statistics reported.

segment.name: statistics
segment.desc: To transmit summary statistics related to a specified collection of test result values.

segment.name: statisticalConcept
segment.desc: To specify a statistical concept.

segment.name: stages
segment.desc: To provide information related to the kind of stage in a process, the number of stages and the actual stage.

segment.name: status
segment.desc: To specify the type of industry sector/application to which this segment refers, giving the status and status reason relevant to conducting business and/or services.

segment.name: dutytaxfeeDetails
segment.desc: To specify relevant duty/tax/fee information.

segment.name: transportChargerateCalculations
segment.desc: To specify charges.

segment.name: detailsOfTransport
segment.desc: To specify the transport details such as mode of transport, means of transport, its conveyance reference number and the identification of the means of transport. The segment may be pointed to by the TPL segment.

segment.name: testMethod
segment.desc: To describe the nature of the test performed.

segment.name: transportMovementDetails
segment.desc: To specify operational transport movement details for a goods item or equipment (which may differ from the contractual conditions).

segment.name: temperature
segment.desc: To specify the temperature setting.

segment.name: termsOfDeliveryOrTransport
segment.desc: To specify terms of delivery or transport.

segment.name: transportPlacement
segment.desc: To specify placement of goods or equipment in relation to the transport used. The segment serves as a pointer to the TDT segment group.

segment.name: technicalRules
segment.desc: A segment specifying technical rules.

segment.name: transportServiceRequirements
segment.desc: To specify the contract and carriage conditions and service and priority requirements for the transport.

segment.name: valueListIdentification
segment.desc: To identify a coded or non coded value list.

segment.name: accommodationAllocationInformation
segment.desc: To specify the references, the type and the characteristic of accomodations allocated as a result of a reservation request. Note: The component 4184 - Special requirement data for additional information - occurs 99 times in the composite.

segment.name: address
segment.desc: To specify an address.

segment.name: additionalTransportDetails
segment.desc: To convey additional information concerning a means of transport.

segment.name: serviceDetails
segment.desc: To specify date, time and location information related to a service.

segment.name: tourInformation
segment.desc: To convey information concerning a tour.

segment.name: clearTerminateInformation
segment.desc: To specify information required to undo all or part of the previous actions in a business transaction.

segment.name: commissionInformation
segment.desc: To specify information about a commission.

segment.name: connectionDetails
segment.desc: To specify a connection location and designated supplier.

segment.name: contactInformation
segment.desc: To specify contact communication numbers and names.

segment.name: consumerReferenceInformation
segment.desc: To specify consumer reference information.

segment.name: discountInformation
segment.desc: To specify information about discounts.

segment.name: applicationErrorInformation
segment.desc: To identify the type of application error within a message.

segment.name: frequentTravellerInformation
segment.desc: To specify frequent traveller information.

segment.name: hardwareDeviceInformation
segment.desc: To specify a hardware device line number, level of access, type and characteristics of the device.

segment.name: interactiveFreeText
segment.desc: To provide free form information.

segment.name: itemNumber
segment.desc: To specify an item number.

segment.name: carDeliveryInstruction
segment.desc: To specify delivery and chauffeur drive details, including number of passengers and language of passengers for a car.

segment.name: messageActionDetails
segment.desc: To specify the message processing requirements.

segment.name: partyName
segment.desc: To specify information necessary to establish the identity of a party.

segment.name: numberOfUnits
segment.desc: To specify the number of units required.

segment.name: originAndDestinationDetails
segment.desc: To convey first the origin and then final destination of a journey.

segment.name: originatorOfRequestDetails
segment.desc: To provide the originator of request details.

segment.name: productInformation
segment.desc: To specify details related to a product such as configuration and availability.

segment.name: paymentInformation
segment.desc: To specify information concerning the payment.

segment.name: reservationControlInformation
segment.desc: To specify a reference to a reservation.

segment.name: quantityAndActionDetails
segment.desc: To indicate quantity and action required in relation to a product.

segment.name: ruleInformation
segment.desc: To specify rule information and rule status. Note: The component 4440 - Free text - occurs 20 times in composite E005 - Rule text.

segment.name: specialRequirementDetails
segment.desc: To specify special requirements on services, the quantity required, action to be taken and where the requirement should be administered.

segment.name: travellerDocumentInformation
segment.desc: To specify document information related to a traveller.

segment.name: tariffInformation
segment.desc: To specify tariff details relating to a service or product.

segment.name: travellerInformation
segment.desc: To specify traveller(s) and personal details.

segment.name: travelProductInformation
segment.desc: To specify details related to a travel product.

segment.name: vehicle
segment.desc: To convey information about a vehicle.
